attributes.action: Sack Boris Johnson for embarrassing our country and putting our citizens at risk
attributes.background: Boris Johnson is embarrassing and undermining our country with his incompetence and putting our citizens at risk. He has also risked the progress of Brexit with his unfounded claims about Brexit and trade, as well as the NHS. It’s time for him to go.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs/ Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
